Reaction Structure Functions Index
\(e^{\pm} + T \to e^{\pm}+X\) \(F_2^{\gamma},~F_L^{\gamma}\) \(900,~901\)
  \(F_2^{\gamma Z},~F_L^{\gamma Z},~F_3^{\gamma Z}\) \(902,~903,~904\)
  \(F_2^{Z},~F_L^{Z},~F_3^{ Z}\) \(905,~906,~907\)
  \(F_2^{\gamma+\gamma Z+Z},~F_L^{\gamma+\gamma Z+Z},~F_3^{\gamma+\gamma Z+Z}\) \(908,~909,~910\)
  \(F_{2c}^{\gamma+\gamma Z+Z},~F_{Lc}^{\gamma+\gamma Z+Z},~F_{2c}^{\gamma+\gamma Z+Z}\) \(911,~912,~913\)
  \(F_{2b}^{\gamma+\gamma Z+Z},~F_{Lb}^{\gamma+\gamma Z+Z},~F_{2b}^{\gamma+\gamma Z+Z}\) \(914,~915,~916\)
\(~\)
